auth.welcome.title: Welcome to TecShop
auth.welcome.message: Hi {{name}}, welcome to TecShop! Start exploring products and deals.

auth.welcome_seller.title: Welcome, Seller!
auth.welcome_seller.message: Hi {{name}}, your seller account has been created. Set up your shop to start selling.

auth.password_changed.title: Password Changed
auth.password_changed.message: Your password has been changed successfully. If you did not make this change, contact support immediately.
